title: How China Broke Out Of Poverty

media:group.media:title: How China Broke Out Of Poverty
media:group.media:description:
An explanation of how China rose out of poverty and into prosperity within the span of a few decades.

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
1:30 How Did China Do It?
02:03 Luck & Natural Factors
04:32 Intelligent Leadership
12:23 Culture
14:49 Summary
15:28 Outro

Sources: 

Deng Xiaoping And The Transformation Of China - Ezra F. Vogel
Wealth And Power - Orville Schell & John Delury
How Asia Works - Joe Studwell
China's Economy - Arthur R. Kroeber
Globalization And Its Discontents - Joseph E. Stiglitz
Age Of Ambition - Evan Osnos
